channel.title: CVE Feed for vektor-inc -- VK Block Patterns
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vektor-inc -- VK Block Patterns

item.title: CVE-2024-0623|2024-08-01T18:11:35.675Z -- vektor-inc -- vk%20block%20patterns
item.description: The VK Block Patterns plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.31.1.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the vbp_clear_patterns_cache() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to clear the patterns cache via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
